DrawBezier(Vector2, Vector2, Vector2, Vector2, Color, Texture2D, Int32, Single)

Draws a clipped Bezier curve just as UnityEditor.Handles.DrawBezier. If width is 1, tex is ignored; Else if tex is null, a anti-aliased texture tinted with col will be used; else, col is ignored and tex is used.

Declaration
public static void DrawBezier(Vector2 startPos, Vector2 endPos, Vector2 startTan, Vector2 endTan, Color col, Texture2D tex, int segmentCount, float width)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector2 startPos
UnityEngine.Vector2 endPos
UnityEngine.Vector2 startTan
UnityEngine.Vector2 endTan
UnityEngine.Color col
UnityEngine.Texture2D tex
System.Int32 segmentCount
System.Single width
| Improve this Doc View Source

DrawBezier(Vector2, Vector2, Vector2, Vector2, Color, Texture2D, Single)

Draws a Bezier curve just as UnityEditor.Handles.DrawBezier, non-clipped. If width is 1, tex is ignored; Else if tex is null, a anti-aliased texture tinted with col will be used; else, col is ignored and tex is used.

Declaration
public static void DrawBezier(Vector2 startPos, Vector2 endPos, Vector2 startTan, Vector2 endTan, Color col, Texture2D tex, float width = 1F)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector2 startPos
UnityEngine.Vector2 endPos
UnityEngine.Vector2 startTan
UnityEngine.Vector2 endTan
UnityEngine.Color col
UnityEngine.Texture2D tex
System.Single width
| Improve this Doc View Source

DrawLine(Vector2, Vector2, Color, Texture2D, Single)

Draws a non-clipped line. If tex is null, a anti-aliased texture tinted with col will be used; else, col is ignored and tex is used.

Declaration
public static void DrawLine(Vector2 startPos, Vector2 endPos, Color col, Texture2D tex, float width = 1F)

DrawPolygonLine(Vector2[], Color, Texture2D, Single)

Draws a clipped polygon line from the given points. If width is 1, tex is ignored; Else if tex is null, a anti-aliased texture tinted with col will be used; else, col is ignored and tex is used.

Declaration
public static void DrawPolygonLine(Vector2[] points, Color col, Texture2D tex, float width = 1F)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector2[] points
UnityEngine.Color col
UnityEngine.Texture2D tex
System.Single width
